TopicTitle: NASA's Antares rocket exploded shortly after launch

Articles.Content:

http://www.theguardian.com/science/2014/oct/28/antares-rocket-explodes-nasa-launch-pad-orbital-science

Thankfully no loss of life, but still... Damn....
